body_content.explanation: the act of killing yourself intentionally:
examples: I lost my younger brother to suicide.
She attempted suicide when she was a teenager.
The suicide rate among men between the ages of 16 and 25 has risen alarmingly.

body_content.explanation: a person who has killed themselves intentionally:
examples: He proved that the two "suicides" were in fact murdered.

body_content.explanation: any act that has the effect of causing your own defeat:
examples: As a leader he knows that it is political suicide to appear indecisive.
Publicly battling with your record company can be career suicide.
